original_text: After these days his wife Elizabeth conceived, and for five months she kept herself hidden, saying,
korean_text: 이후에 그의 아내 엘리사벳이 잉태하고 다섯 달 동안 숨어 있으며 이르되

sentences.original_text: After these days his wife Elizabeth conceived
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날들 후에 그의 아내 엘리사벳이 잉태하고

sentences.original_text: and for five months she kept herself hidden
